command.elementalcraft.only_players: §cThis command can only be used by players
command.elementalcraft.player_only: §cThis command can only be used by players
command.elementalcraft.debug.global_noti: §e§l[Elemental Debug Mode] §7You have enabled debug mode. All elemental damage will now be displayed
enchantment.elementalcraft.fire_strike.d: §7Grants the weapon Flame attack element, dealing additional Flame elemental damage
enchantment.elementalcraft.nature_strike: §7Grants the weapon Nature attack element, dealing additional Nature elemental damage
§7Grants the weapon Frost attack element, dealing additional Frost elemental damage
enchantment.elementalcraft.thunder_strik: §7Grants the weapon Thunder attack element, dealing additional Thunder elemental damage
enchantment.elementalcraft.fire_enhancem: §7Greatly increases damage bonus against Flame attacks
enchantment.elementalcraft.nature_enhanc: §7Greatly increases damage bonus against Nature attacks
enchantment.elementalcraft.frost_enhance: §7Greatly increases damage bonus against Frost attacks
enchantment.elementalcraft.thunder_enhan: §7Greatly increases damage bonus against Thunder attacks
command.elementalcraft.forcedadd.saved: §7Configuration saved and cache refreshed. Changes applied immediately.
command.elementalcraft.forcedremove.not_: §e%s §7has no forced attributes, no need to remove
command.elementalcraft.forcedremove.save: §7Configuration saved and cache refreshed. Changes applied immediately.
command.elementalcraft.blacklist.invalid: §cInvalid element ID: %s (available: fire, frost, thunder, nature, all)
command.elementalcraft.blacklist.use_rem: §cPlease use the remove subcommand to clear the existing blacklist entry first.
command.elementalcraft.biomebias.invalid: §cInvalid element ID: %s (available: fire, frost, thunder, nature, all)
command.elementalcraft.biomebias.conflic: §e%s §7already has §lALL §7elements bias configured. Cannot add individual element.
command.elementalcraft.biomebias.use_rem: §cPlease use the remove subcommand to clear the existing configuration first.
command.elementalcraft.biomebias.list_no: §cYou must be in a biome to use the list command.
command.elementalcraft.biomebias.saved: §7Configuration saved and cache refreshed. Changes applied immediately.
command.elementalcraft.forceditem.saved: §7Configuration saved and cache refreshed. Changes applied immediately.
command.elementalcraft.forceditem.weapon: The item %s already has forced weapon attributes registered.
The item %s already has forced armor attributes registered.
command.elementalcraft.forceditem.use_re: Please use the remove subcommand to clear the existing configuration before adding new attributes.
effect.elementalcraft.wetness.descriptio: You are soaked! Thunder and Frost hurt more, but you resist Fire.
